column6: Stranded on 21st century Earth, the 31st century Guardians finally have a chance to locate the anomaly that is ripping the past, present and future of the Universal Time-stream apart. But locating it is one thing...preventing it is something else altogether. Shocking twists and end-of-the-World action!
column8: | writer:Dan Abnett | artist:Nico Leon | penciller (cover):Gerardo Sandoval
